content: Just wanted to say on this forum, that heaven is real. My friend had a near death experience and talked to an angel and told me that there is a life after this one. With the deaths of US servicemen in the recent years, I would like for you to know that god exist and to not be afraid. I also read the recent webbot prophecy's and linked them with other prophets, and would like to warn you of the up coming danger we face. I guess Israel is going to attack Iran, and were not going to be ready for it economically or something. It says we take heavy casualties and within about 2-3 months our army is in shambles. We lose a serious of battles trying to help the Israelites out but it fails eventually and lose some battles with China. Starting around October or November this year and going through to early next year.

content: Just wanted to say on this forum, that heaven is real. My friend had a near death experience and talked to an angel and told me that there is a life after this one. With the deaths of US servicemen in the recent years, I would like for you to know that god exist and to not be afraid. I also read the recent webbot prophecy's and linked them with other prophets, and would like to warn you of the up coming danger we face. I guess Israel is going to attack Iran, and were not going to be ready for it economically or something. It says we take heavy casualties and within about 2-3 months our army is in shambles. We lose a serious of battles trying to help the Israelites out but it fails eventually and lose some battles with China. Starting around October or November this year and going through to early next year.
